mapper.select: SELECT A.EMPNO , A.EMPNM , A.EMAIL_ADDR , A.CPNO , A.BZCD , A.AUT_CD , A.LGN_PWD , CASE WHEN A.LGN_PWD != #{lgn_pwd} THEN 'N' WHEN A.LGN_PWD = #{empno} '211111' THEN 'C' ELSE 'Y' END AS LOGIN_YN FROM pms_emp_info A WHERE 1=1 AND A.EMPNO = #{empno} AND A.PRJT_ID = #{prjt_id} AND A.BKUP_ID = '0000000000'
